short_interest.data_note: Short interest is relatively low at 2.64% of float. Days-to-cover of 1.66 suggests limited short squeeze potential.
short_interest.trend: Stable — no significant recent increase in short positioning despite elevated valuation

options_activity.oi: Absorbed nearly all existing OI at $160 strike
options_activity.significance: Whale-sized institutional hedge against significant downside. Buy-to-open $170 put, sell $160 put. Suggests institution protecting portfolio against 25-30% drawdown.
New monthly expiry options available for trading

put_call_ratio.interpretation: Bearish — ratio above 1.0 indicates more put open interest than calls. However, recent decline suggests some normalization.

implied_volatility_context.note: Post-earnings IV crush expected after Jan 28 Q2 FY2026 report. Stock saw 9% single-day move in early February, indicating realized vol remains elevated.

buyback_support.fcf_return_target: 75-100% of free cash flow via dividends + buybacks
buyback_support.impact: Provides floor support for stock; reduces share count and boosts EPS

risk_signals_summary.overall_sentiment: Cautiously bearish short-term positioning amid bullish fundamental backdrop

key_signals.interpretation: Large player protecting against 25-30% downside by March 2026
Options market pricing more downside protection than upside speculation
No significant short thesis building despite elevated valuation

key_signals.signal: Recent 9% single-day selloff followed by weak bounce
